availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Organized at Camp Dick Robinson, Kentucky. Mustered in on October 8, 1861. Mustered out on November 16, 1864. Commander(s): Captain John M. Hewitt.
One of the constituent batteries of the 1st Kentucky Light Artillery Regiment. Also known as the 2nd Kentucky Battery.

ab.bibl:
Frederick H. Dyer, A Compendium to the War of the Rebellion, Vol. II (Des Moines, IA: Dyer Publishing Company, 1908), 1196.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 506-507, 520-521.
R. M. Kelly, The Union Regiments of Kentucky (Louisville: Courier-Journal Job Printing Co., 1897), 681-683.
